docs.snippet: More than 50,000 people were expected to gather in Cambria Heights to pay tribute to Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, one of the most influential Jewish leaders of the 20th century....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 50,000 people were expected to gather in Cambria Heights to pay tribute to Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, one of the most influential Jewish leaders of the 20th century.
docs.abstract: More than 50,000 people are expected to gather at Old Montefiore Cemetery in Cambria Heights neighborhood of Queens to pay tribute to Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson on 20th anniversary of his death; he is one of the most influential Jewish leaders of the 20th century.

headline.seo: Commemorating 20th Anniversary of Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson’s Death
headline.main: Thousands Beat Path to Queens Cemetery to Remember a Jewish Leader
headline.print_headline: Beating a Worldwide Path to a Cemetery in Queens

docs.snippet: The United States was eliminated from the World Cup by Belgium despite a memorable performance from goalkeeper Tim Howard....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States was eliminated from the World Cup by Belgium despite a memorable performance from goalkeeper Tim Howard.
docs.abstract: United States is eliminated from World Cup by Belgium, but memorable performance from United States' goalkeeper Tim Howard inspires nation; soccer is gaining in popularity in America, and team's showing, especially Howard's performance, further captivates and propels sport's growing popularity.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Belgium Eliminates Team U.S.A.
headline.main: Wild Ride by U.S. Comes to End, but Soccer Is the Winner
headline.print_headline: Wild Ride by U.S. Reaches End, but Soccer Comes Out a Winner
